reference.shortdesc: The mainbooktitle element contains the primary title for a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The mainbooktitle element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how to use mainbooktitle to provide the main title of the book:
example.codeblock: <bookmap> <booktitle> <booklibrary>Construction Equipment</booklibrary> <mainbooktitle>Bulldozer Service Manual</mainbooktitle> <booktitlealt>Models 1234-5678</booktitlealt> </booktitle> <!-- ... metadata, front matter, and book content ... --> </bookmap>
